QuestData.Title: Masters of Disguise
QuestData.Description: <You scan over Knockwhistle's report.>$B$B"My chute caught a piece of shrapnel. Made a rough landing in a ravenbear nest. Luckily, a bunch of eggs broke my fall.$B$BLost sight of Illandris and Shwayder. Both are masters of disguise, and I am confident they can remain undetected.$B$BWill continue to monitor the enemy's activity. Just need to clean all the yolk off my cloaking device. Hope the mother's not around...
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Spymaster Illandris and Spymaster Shwayder.
